attributes.action: prevent Lambeth council from evicting The Bones Theatre from its 'Creative Space'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the undersigned, support the aims and objectives of the Friends of The Bones Theatre to preserve The Bones Theatre and allow the theatre to remain at and continue working in its ‘Creative Space’ in Leigham Vale, Tulse Hill, London.

We ask that Lambeth Council cancel the eviction of The Bones Theatre from the above-mentioned property and take appropriate action to acknowledge the existence and support the valuable work of The Bones Theatre in the community of Streatham, Leigham Vale. 

The establishment of a community theatre, providing a social and cultural focus for the area and an educational and training facility, would be a valuable contribution to the regeneration of Tulse Hill and Lambeth overall, and a visual symbol that the local community have finally succeeded in reclaiming their neighbourhood. 


Friends of The Bones Theatre
